configuration.name: accountId
configuration.title: Account ID
configuration.description: Account ID to be associated with the query

configuration.name: query
configuration.title: Query
configuration.description: NRQL query for visualization. Recommended to SELECT your Y value (value to plot), and facet by your custom timestamp attribute (X value).

configuration.name: selectUnit
configuration.title: Value Unit
configuration.description: Unit of measurement for attribute being plotted.

configuration.name: timestampUnit
configuration.title: Timestamp Unit
configuration.description: Unit of measurement for timestamp - Seconds or Milliseconds since Epoch.

configuration.name: chartType
configuration.title: Chart Type
configuration.description: The type of timeseries chart you want to plot as.

configuration.name: lineColor
configuration.title: Line Color
configuration.description: Color of timeseries line. Accepts regular colors and hex colors.
